application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Back Garden (Left Boundary) T1: Leylandii tree (located next to house) - Reduce height by 3 - 4m, cut all sides back by 1.5m Current height 12 metresReducing height down to 9metresSpread of tree before 9 metresSpread of tree after reduction 7.5 metres (Back Boundary) T2: Leylandii tree - Reduce height by 3m, trim tight to shape (garden side only), cut extended leader overhanging neighbour's property back by 1.5 - 2m, trim remainder of overhang to shape, lift canopy by 0.5 - 1m above ground level Current height standing at 11 metres Reducing height down to 8 metresSpread of tree before 7 metresSpread of tree after reduction 5.5 metres T3: Small leylandii tree - Fell to ground levelCurrent height standing at 4 metres Reducing height down to  0metresSpread of tree before 3 metresSpread of tree after reduction 0 metres T4: Prunus tree - Reduce height by 2m, reduce sides to balance and shape, remove major deadwood Current height standing at 7 metres Reducing height down to 5 metresSpread of tree before 5 metresSpread of tree after reduction 4 metres (Right Boundary) T5: Robinia tree -  Reduction to pollard back by around 3m NB: There is dieback in the top canopy and ganoderma bracket fungus present at the base.  Current height standing at 8 metres Reducing height down to 5 metresSpread of tree before 3 metresSpread of tree after reduction 2.5 metres Reason for work maintaining this tree in its current setting, Reduce shading to house
